frontMatter.title: Web Development with Go
frontMatter.description: Build web applications with Go's standard library and popular frameworks. Learn how to create RESTful APIs, handle HTTP requests, and connect to databases.

labs.title: HTTP Server Basics
labs.description: Learn how to create a simple HTTP server using Go's net/http package.

labs.title: Routing with Gorilla Mux
labs.description: Use the Gorilla Mux router to create more complex routes.

labs.title: Building a REST API
labs.description: Implement a RESTful API with JSON responses.
